alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 1:24PM CDT until August 08 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Shannon County in south central Missouri... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Eminence, or 24 miles northeast of Mountain View, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Echo Bluff State Park... Current River State Park... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Eminence... Alley Spring... Midridge... Round Spring... West Eminence... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
